scripts.dev: npm run 'build wasm debug' && npm run 'copy wasm debug' && vite
scripts.build: npm run 'build wasm release' && npm run 'copy wasm release' && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.build then preview: npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.copy wasm debug: npm run 'create directories' && cp ./build/cmake-build-emscripten-debug/Quoridor.js ./src/wasm && cp ./build/cmake-build-emscripten-debug/Quoridor.wasm ./src/wasm && cp ./build/cmake-build-emscripten-debug/Quoridor.wasm ./public
scripts.copy wasm release: npm run 'create directories' && cp ./build/cmake-build-emscripten-release/Quoridor.js ./src/wasm && cp ./build/cmake-build-emscripten-release/Quoridor.wasm ./src/wasm && cp ./build/cmake-build-emscripten-release/Quoridor.wasm ./public
